Package BTreePackage

Class BTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
BTreePackage.BTree<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The element type
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchTree<E>
public class BTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchTree<E>
An implementation of the B-tree. A B-tree is a search tree in which each node contains n data items where n is between N/2 and N. (For the root, n may be between 1 and N. Other than leaves there are n+1 children. The tree is always balanced in that all leaves are on the same level, i.e., the length of the path from the root to a leaf is constant.

    A Node represents a node in a B-tree tree.

      private void insertIntoNode​(BTree.Node<E> node, int index, E item, BTree.Node<E> child)
      Method to insert a new value into a node pre node.data[index-1] < item %lt; node.data[index]; post node.data[index] == item and old values are moved right one
      Parameters:
      node - The node to insert the value into
      index - The index where the inserted item is to be placed
      item - The value to be inserted
      child - The right child if the value

    • binarySearch

      private int binarySearch​(E target, E[] data, int first, int last)
      Perform a binary search of the array data for target.
      Parameters:
      target - The item being sought
      data - The sorted array the may contain the data
      first - The first index to be searched
      last - One past the last index to be searched
      Returns:
      The smallest index such that target >= data[index]
